description:
1.Learning is the eye of the mind.
学问是心灵的眼睛。
2.Learn young, learn fair.
学习趁年少，而且要学好。
3.What is learned in the cradle is carried to the grave.
孩提时代学到的东西，至死也不会忘却。
4.Learn from the mistakes of others and prevent your own.
前人犯错，后人戒。
5.Studies serve for delight, for ornament and for ability. Their chief use for delight is in privateness and retiring; for ornament, is in discourse; and for ability, is in the judgment and disposition of business."
读书足以怡情，足以博彩，足以长才。其怡情也，最见于独处幽居之时；其傅彩也，最见于高谈阔论之中；其长才也，最见于处世判事之际。
6.Much learning shows how little mortals know. ----Francis Young
博学而后始知人类所知有限。 ----拂朗西斯-杨
7.The brain can be developed just the same as the muscles can be developed, if one will only take the pains to train the mind to think. ----Thomas Edison
一个人的头脑可以像肌肉一样得到发展，只要你肯不辞辛苦的训练你的心智去思考。 ----托马斯-爱迪生　
8.I would like to live to study， and not study to live. -Bacon
我愿意为了学习而活着，不愿意为了活着而学习。 -培根
9.a little leak will sink a great ship.
千丈之堤溃於蚁穴。
10.ignorance is not innocence but sin.
无知并非纯真，而是罪恶。
11.time is a bird for ever on the wing.
时间是一只永远在飞翔的鸟。
